definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle

sentences.english: After rolling, these inclusions turn from ball-like shape to chain-like and dot-linked shapes.
sentences.chinese: 夾雜形狀經軋製後由球形逐漸變爲長條形和點鏈狀。

sentences.english: The radial-axial large ring rolling technology was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 研究了大型環件的徑軸向軋製工藝。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the development of low temperature rolling technology for wire and rod.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了國內外棒線材低溫軋製技術的發展情況。

sentences.english: Some scientific data are provided for improving the rolling process technology of TZM alloy sheets.
sentences.chinese: 爲改進鉬合金板材軋製工藝提供了科學數據。

sentences.english: Rolling force model is the crucial model for process control in cold rolling.
sentences.chinese: 軋製力數學模型是冷軋工藝控制系統的中樞模型。

sentences.english: The shell not-rotation is the important technical requirement for planetary cross-mill.
sentences.chinese: 軋件不轉是行星斜軋機軋製的重要工藝要求。

sentences.english: Programming the off-line simulation process and computing the working roll wear in a certain rolling period as scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 編制離線仿真程序，計算某一軋製週期工作輥磨損。

sentences.english: Twin lamellae will be deformed differently when rolling in different direction.
sentences.chinese: 隨軋製方向不同，孿晶在形變中的行爲也不同。

sentences.english: The formed split end and tail cracking of wire rod during rolling are a common sight.
sentences.chinese: 線材軋製過程中軋件出現劈頭與尾裂是常見現象。

sentences.english: The article has introduced the cross wedge rolling preforming technology and its die design.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了楔橫軋製坯工藝及其模具設計。

sentences.english: The rolling strategy is the base for presetting the process control parameters of cold tandem mill.
sentences.chinese: 軋製策略是冷連軋機進行過程控制參數設定的基礎。

sentences.english: The rolling process of medium plate was analyzed with the explicit dynamic finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 採用動態顯式有限元法對中厚板軋製過程進行了分析。

sentences.english: As the rolling reduction increases, the proportion of fine lamella increases.
sentences.chinese: 精細片層區域的比例隨着軋製壓下率的提高而增大。

sentences.english: This article presents research on rolling technology of micro-alloyed high carbon hard wire at JISCO.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了酒鋼微合金高碳鋼硬線軋製工藝研究。

sentences.english: The optimized specification can be used in production and rolling theory research.
sentences.chinese: 本規程可用於生產並對軋製理論研究有指導意義。

sentences.english: The heat stamping experiment proves the deep drawing property of AZ31 magnesium alloy thin sheet.
sentences.chinese: 交叉軋製的AZ31鎂合金薄板具有良好的深衝性能。
